name: Oh Gnome !!!
description:
Oh Gnome !!! is a third person gnome on gnome fighting game made during the #KrassJam and was made in 3 days and 18 hours. Enemy gnomes snuck through your borders during the night and stole the princess, you are tasked to get your princess back but make sure you wipe the enemies out for good or they could try to capture her again !

You can watch the live development of Oh Gnome at : https://twitch.tv/indie_mike

Twitter - @IndieDevMike
